value:
The people gathered in this castle
do not share a common discipline,
or even a uniform.$k$pAnd yet, they all seem to follow you
without question... How strange.

Young girls these days are weaklings.
Running away or even crying from
only the slightest bit of scolding...$k$pIt wasn't like that at all when I was
young.

It's embarrassing to admit, but I can't
even crack an egg without hurting
someone.$k$pYou ought to remove me from meal
duty...for the troops' sake.

Some say a direct charge from
Begnion's Holy Guard is like seeing
the sun break through the clouds.$k$pEven in the skies of another world,
not a single one of us will fall out of
formation.

Ah, Summoner. Thank you for all of
your assistance. Courtesy is key
between allies, wouldn't you agree?

I am Tanith. Please accept this gift
from $Nf.

It is time to show what Begnion's
Holy Guard is capable of! No enemy
will pass through these skies!

This is tolerable, but it seems like
I'll need to add one more task to
my training routine.

Whether it's real combat or merely
training, I must do better. I cannot let
my subordinates see me like this.

A new technique has opened up
to me. I'll put it to good use.

I am Tanith, deputy commander of
Begnion's Holy Guard. Don't expect
me to be as lenient as Sigrun.

You look uncomfortable. Is something
the matter, $Nu?$k$pHmm... I see. So you heard someone
call me the "Great Demon." Well, that
is what I was called back in my world.$k$pThe truth is, my teaching methods
can sometimes be a little...intense. If
anything, that name is a compliment.$k$pIt would be troublesome if some
noble's daughter joined our pegasus
knights merely to go sightseeing.$k$pAfter all, a group is only as strong
as its weakest member. In times
of crisis, we must protect each other.$k$pIf being strict can help my
subordinates return home safely,
I do not care what they call me.$k$pFor the sake of Begnion's future, I
have been charged with teaching and
protecting the noble Holy Guards.$k$pIt is a responsibility I intend to carry
out with all of my heart and soul.$k$p...It's a bit embarrassing to say out
loud, though, so I would appreciate it
if you kept that last part between us.
はっ！
ていっ！
きゃああっ！
やってくれる…！
By the Holy Guard!
This ends now!
Spare no one!
Fall by my sword!
May fortune follow you, Apostle...
Hmpht
I am Tanith, deputy commander of the Begnion Empire's Holy Guard. I am an officer, and you will address me as such.
Soldier! Face me, or be prepared for the consequences.
I'm on a quest to find the apostle, but she certainly does not make it easy.
It's embarrassing to admit, but I can't even crack an egg without hurting someone.

Today we'll show them a fight
that will honor the apostle's guards!
Cooking is a useful skill, even in battle. I could make rations. I'm good with a knife.
No harm shall fall upon you. I've made it my responsibility to protect you.
Very well.
Your plan?
Press on.
